mapper.select: SELECT sg.id, d.dictionary_name AS product_type, d.`code`, GROUP_CONCAT(pa.attr_name) AS attr_name FROM dimall_bash_dictionary d LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_sku_gm sg ON sg.product_type = d.`code` LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_attr pa ON pa.id = sg.attr_id WHERE d.super_code = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' GROUP BY d.`code` ORDER BY sg.id

select ddpa.attr_name, group_concat(ddpav.attr_value) as attrValue from djmall_dict_product_sku_gm ddpsg left join djmall_dict_product_attr ddpa on ddpsg.attr_id = ddpa.id left join djmall_dict_product_attr_value ddpav on ddpsg.attr_id = ddpav.attr_id where ddpsg.product_type = #{productType} group by ddpa.id
